articles.description: A 65-year old man enrolled in Medicare with a Medigap plan will need to stash away $166,000 for medical expenses.
articles.content:
Most Americans underestimate their health care costs in retirement, and thats a problem because those future bills may turn out to be considerably higher than you expect.
